entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kamouraska
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:35 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
